title: PL/SQL Compile Errors / PL/SQL Derleme HatalarÄ±
description: Shows PL/SQL compilation errors in EBS schemas

queries.sql: SELECT owner, name, type, line, position, text FROM dba_errors WHERE owner IN ('APPLSYS', 'APPS', 'GL', 'AR', 'AP') ORDER BY owner, name, line FETCH FIRST 100 ROWS ONLY

doc_hint: Shows PL/SQL compilation errors in key EBS schemas. Use to identify broken packages/procedures.
analysis_prompt: List PL/SQL errors in EBS schemas. For each error: (1) which object is affected, (2) error message type, (3) recommend recompilation or investigation.
